languages.text: Лорд-капитан при содействии Абеляра Версериана, не по наслышке знакомого с устройством многих имперских кораблей, разработали маршрут в обход опасного участка. Крюк стал причиной задержки еще на два часа, однако усилия того стоили — хранилище, до которого добрались разведчики, был заполнен сохранным грузом.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан при содействии Абеляра Версериана, не по наслышке знакомого с устройством многих имперских кораблей, разработали маршрут в обход опасного участка. Крюк стал причиной задержки еще на два часа, однако усилия того стоили — хранилище, до которого добрались разведчики, был заполнен сохранным грузом.

languages.text: With the assistance of Abelard Werserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан при содействии Абеляра Версериана, не по наслышке знакомого с устройством многих имперских кораблей, разработали маршрут в обход опасного участка. Крюк стал причиной задержки еще на два часа, однако усилия того стоили — хранилище, до которого добрались разведчики, был заполнен сохранным грузом.

traits.locale_text: With the assistance of Abelard Verserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.

With the assistance of Abelard Verserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.

With the assistance of Abelard Verserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.

With the assistance of Abelard Werserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.

languages.text: Con ayuda de Abelard Werserian, que conocía a fondo la distribución de numerosas naves imperiales, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} planificó una ruta que rodeaba la sección peligrosa. El desvío añadió dos horas de trayecto, pero mereció la pena: cuando los exploradores llegaron al depósito, comprobaron que estaba lleno de carga intacta.
languages.original_text: With the assistance of Abelard Werserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.

traits.locale_text: Con ayuda de Abelard Werserian, que conocía a fondo la distribución de numerosas naves imperiales, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} planificó una ruta que rodeaba la sección peligrosa. El desvío añadió dos horas de trayecto, pero mereció la pena: cuando los exploradores llegaron al depósito, comprobaron que estaba lleno de carga intacta.

languages.text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森对帝国舰船的布局相当了解。在阿贝拉德的帮助下，舰长大人绘制了一条绕过危险区域的路线。由于绕路，小队额外花了两个小时的时间，但这么做是值得的。当侦察兵们抵达储藏库时，发现里面装满了完好无损的物资。
languages.original_text: With the assistance of Abelard Werserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.

traits.locale_text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森对帝国舰船的布局相当了解。在阿贝拉德的帮助下，舰长大人绘制了一条绕过危险区域的路线。由于绕路，小队额外花了两个小时的时间，但这么做是值得的。当侦察兵们抵达储藏库时，发现里面装满了完好无损的物资。

languages.text: 多くの帝国軍艦の構成に精通したアベラルド・ウェルザリアンの力を借りたロード・キャプテンは、危険な区域を迂回するルートを考案した。迂回することで遠征時間は2時間増えたが、その甲斐はあった。偵察部隊がついに到着した保管庫には無傷の貨物がいっぱい入っていたのだ。
languages.original_text: With the assistance of Abelard Werserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.

traits.locale_text: 多くの帝国軍艦の構成に精通したアベラルド・ウェルザリアンの力を借りたロード・キャプテンは、危険な区域を迂回するルートを考案した。迂回することで遠征時間は2時間増えたが、その甲斐はあった。偵察部隊がついに到着した保管庫には無傷の貨物がいっぱい入っていたのだ。

languages.text: Mit der Unterstützung von Abelard Werserian, der mit dem Aufbau diverser imperialer Schiffe vertraut war, ermittelte der Lord Captain eine Route, die den gefährlichen Bereich umging. Der Umweg kostete sie zwei Stunden, aber er war die Mühe wert – das Lager, als die Späher es endlich erreichten, war voll mit unversehrter Fracht.
languages.original_text: With the assistance of Abelard Werserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.

traits.locale_text: Mit der Unterstützung von Abelard Werserian, der mit dem Aufbau diverser imperialer Schiffe vertraut war, ermittelte der Lord Captain eine Route, die den gefährlichen Bereich umging. Der Umweg kostete sie zwei Stunden, aber er war die Mühe wert – das Lager, als die Späher es endlich erreichten, war voll mit unversehrter Fracht.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} mit à profit les connaissances d'Abélard Werserian pour établir un itinéraire qui permettrait d'éviter la section dangereuse. Le détour rallongea l'expédition de deux heures, mais le jeu en valait la chandelle : lorsque les éclaireurs atteignirent enfin l'entrepôt, ils découvrirent qu'il était rempli de matériel intact.
languages.original_text: With the assistance of Abelard Werserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} mit à profit les connaissances d'Abélard Werserian pour établir un itinéraire qui permettrait d'éviter la section dangereuse. Le détour rallongea l'expédition de deux heures, mais le jeu en valait la chandelle : lorsque les éclaireurs atteignirent enfin l'entrepôt, ils découvrirent qu'il était rempli de matériel intact.

languages.text: İmparatorluk gemilerinin konfigürasyonuna aşina olan Abelard Werserian'ın desteğini alan Lord Kaptan, bu tehlikeli bölümün etrafından dolanan alternatif bir rota belirledi. Yoldan çıktığı için iki saat kaybeden keşif erlerinin çabaları, sonunda meyve verdi. Depolama birimine ulaştıklarında depoyu, el değmemiş kargolarla dolu hâlde buldular.
languages.original_text: With the assistance of Abelard Werserian, who was familiar with the configuration of many Imperial ships, the Lord Captain devised a route around the dangerous section. The detour added two hours to their journey, but it was worth the effort — the storage depot, when the scouts finally reached it, was full of intact cargo.

traits.locale_text: İmparatorluk gemilerinin konfigürasyonuna aşina Abelard Werserian'ın desteğini alan Lord Kaptan, bu tehlikeli bölümün etrafından dolanan alternatif bir rota belirledi. Yoldan çıktığı için iki saat kaybeden takımın çabaları sonunda meyvesini verdi. Depolama birimine ulaştıklarında depo el değmemiş bir kargolarla dolup taşıyordu.
